name: What is DevFest?
des: DevFests are community led developer events hosted by Google Developers Groups around the globe.

name: What are GDGs?
des: GDGs are focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies.

name: Who can register for DevFest?
des: Beginners, experts, literally everyone. Anyone with the passion of learning, who’s fond of technology, passionate programmers , everybody can register and attend.

name: Is it mandatory to register to participate in the event?
des: Yes. Each individual may register for only one ticket. You may not register on behalf of anyone else.

name: I’m a beginner in programming. Can I still register?
des: Yes. Anybody with the zeal in technology can register. We have special tracks especially for beginners.

name: What will attendees get by participating in the event?
des: We have a plethora of AMAZING perks awaiting for you!

name: How can I become a member of GDG?
des: Head to Google developers group website (https://gdg.community.dev/) and find the nearest GDG in your location.

name: How can I communicate my queries?
des: Reach out to us at devfestindia@gmail.com
